training_phrases: till when is the office open
responses:
Branch timing (North India): 9.30 am to 6.00 pm
                    Branch timing (South India): 9.30 am to 5.30 pm
                    Days: Monday to Saturday

training_phrases: how to apply for personal loan
responses: You can apply for a personal loan easily by clicking on the link below.
You can visit any of the nearest Muthoot Homefin branches to apply for a home loan, or you can directly apply online through the link given below.
Complete any of the transactions related to Gold Loan here:

The working of Loan@Home is very simple.You can raise a gold loan request via the ‘Loan@Home’ mobile application or just give us a call on the toll-free number 1800-202-1212. One of our executives will get in touch with you and be at your doorstep within 30 minutes.
           All the e-documentation and evaluation of the gold will be done at your home, after which we will transfer the required gold loan amount directly to your bank account.
           Please note that all our ‘Loan@Home’ executives are COVID-19 safe. They stringently adhere to all the necessary safety precautions advised by the Government of India and WHO.
           Use the given links below for further assistance:
